description:
Welcome to this stunning townhouse located in the prestigious Manor Views Estate. This solid brick, two-story property boasts 232m2 of luxurious living space, making it the perfect choice for young families and savvy investors.

As you enter the home, you'll be impressed by the spacious and well-maintained original kitchen, complete with plenty of storage, a chic Laminex finish, a breakfast bar, and a dishwasher. The large pantry and the kitchen's close proximity to the dining room make it ideal for entertaining, and the views of the picturesque courtyard provide a lovely backdrop.

The formal dining room features a glass sliding door that floods the space with natural light, while the separate living room at the front of the house boasts plush carpeting and air conditioning for your comfort.

Upstairs, you'll find three elegantly appointed bedrooms, all with built-in wardrobes and plush carpeting. The master bedroom is a true haven, with full-length mirrored wardrobes and a spacious ensuite bathroom. The other two bedrooms are equipped with ceiling fans to keep you comfortable. A spacious second bathroom with a separate bath and shower, as well as plenty of storage, rounds out the upper level.

The townhouse also features a convenient internal laundry and separate toilet on the lower level, as well as ample under-stair storage.

Stepping outside, you'll discover a large and impeccably maintained courtyard, complete with plenty of space for children and pets to play. A water tank and garden shed add to the property's practicality. The townhouse comes with a two-car garage with remote control and direct access to the courtyard, and the entire property is fitted with security screens for your peace of mind.

The gated complex offers residents a secure and tranquil retreat, with plenty of visitor parking, tropical gardens, and a beautifully presented communal area for hosting events. The complex also boasts an in-ground pool with an adjoining spa and level lawns for play.

Features:
- Walking distance to shops, transport, and parks
- Spacious and well-maintained original kitchen
- Large dining room with glass sliding door that leads to the patio
- Separate living room at the front of the house
- Three generously sized bedrooms with built-in wardrobes
- Large and impeccably maintained courtyard
- Two-car garage
- Gated entry
- In-ground pool, spa and BBQ area

This townhouse is located in an unbeatable location, with shops, transport, and parks all within walking distance. The Manor Views Estate is tucked between Hill Road and Daw Road and is just 300m from Runcorn Plaza. Bus stops for city connections are a mere 50m away, and the townhouse is just a short walk from Warrigal Square, which offers a range of fashionable shops, cafes, and restaurants. The townhouse is also within the catchment for highly regarded Warrigal Primary and Runcorn State High School. Don't miss this opportunity to own a piece of paradise in the heart of it all.

Disclaimer: We have in preparing this information used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained herein is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect of any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements that may occur.
